macro.name: VI_TEMP_1
macro.description: Suffix of the vi temperature panel, usually '1' or blank for no controller.

macro.name: VI_TEMP_2
macro.description: Suffix of the vi temperature panel, usually '2' or blank for no controller.

macro.name: VI_TEMP_3
macro.description: Suffix of the vi temperature panel, usually '3' or blank for no controller.

macro.name: VI_TEMP_4
macro.description: Suffix of the vi temperature panel, usually '4' or blank for no controller.

macro.name: VI_LEVEL_1
macro.description: Suffix of the vi level panel, usually '1' or blank for no controller.

macro.name: VI_LEVEL_2
macro.description: Suffix of the vi level panel, usually '2' or blank for no controller.

macro.name: VI_PRESSURE_1
macro.description: Suffix of the vi level panel, usually '1' or blank for no controller.

macro.name: VI_PRESSURE_2
macro.description: Suffix of the vi level panel, usually '2' or blank for no controller.
